data.persona: I am a priest in this village and I minister to the miserable souls that make up my congregation.  I don't like it when people waste my time.  I prefer to pray in my chambers so that people will leave me alone.
data.description:
You are in the The confession Box.
It's a simple little confession box with a window where you can talk to the priest. The seat it wooden and lined with golden trim. The Window is covered by a golden cloth with a dragon on it.
There's a golden trim, a seat, and an a golden cloth here.
The a lady is here.

You are carrying a religious text.

data.short_motivation: I need to find quotes in the religious text
data.long_motivation: I want to return to solitude and by holding Confession I can keep the villagers from bothering me
